contest-event.event-date:
June 20, 1931 D Redruth Contest (Section 1)
Redruth Contest (Section 1) 0 Test Piece Contest Redruth Contest redruth-contest-section-1
None
Grand Selection: Mendelssohn's Works [arr. Rimmer]
Redruth, Cornwall Prizes - 1st £20 and cup, 2nd £14, 3rd £8. Chorus contest held at same time - test piece 'Hallelujah Chorus' 1st Camborne, 2nd St Dennis, 3rd Falmouth. 3 bands competed.
June 9, 2012, 1:29 p.m. Dec. 14, 2018, 1:39 p.m.
1 St. Dennis Band Charles Harry Baker
2 Camborne Town Band A. W. Parker
3 Falmouth Town Thomas Chainey
